name: Riot City
description:
Hello!

We are SteelWorkGames, a group of students who are currently coursing 2nd level on Continguts Digitals Interactius at Enti UB. The members of the team are:

-Àlex Balastegui (Developer)

-Javier García (Developer)

-Xavier Guimerà (Artist)

-Bryan Estrada (Artist)

This is the game we have created with all our love and effort during the past months. We all hope that you enjoy it!  (Windows only!)

If you wanna contact us, do not hesitate and do so using our social network:

-Twitter: https://twitter.com/Steelworks0

-Instagram https://www.instagram.com/steelworksgames/

-Gmail https://www.instagram.com/steelworksgames/

-Web https://javiergarciagomez.wixsite.com/steelworks

Anything you want to say to us we'll be glad to hear you. 

First try our demo version, totally free with one level available:  https://heiliant.itch.io/riotcitydemo

We also want to thank many people for sharing their assets freely on the internet so we could make this game possible. Thanks to Luos (particle master), daFont (free fonts FTW), ZapSplay (free sounds), textures.com (nice free textures) and many many more. All our classmates with whom we've shared the experience of creating a game. Thanks to all of you!

Also, if you want a free key just contact us, it is very likely that we give you one for free.
